billows/great waves (fig. of a story with great momentum)
to push the wave and add to the billows (idiom); to add momentum/to encourage sth to get bigger/to add fuel to the fire

surging forward with great momentum/unfolding on a magnificent scale

definition: one climax follows another (of thrilling story)

sentences.english: Is afraid that I went to Lan wave building and see county Wang Ye?
sentences.chinese: 是怕我去了瀾波館見着郡王爺？

sentences.english: Do you know what Guanlan is famous for in the world?
sentences.chinese: 你知道不雅觀瀾有什麼在世界聞名？

sentences.english: They get small Sis at Lan wave building front vacant land up fight snow battle.
sentences.chinese: 他們領着小廝們在瀾波館前面空地上打雪仗。

sentences.english: Our six countries are connected by the same river and the Lancang-Mekong sub-region is our common home.
sentences.chinese: 一江連六國，瀾湄次區域是我們的共同家園。

sentences.english: This is Xinglan Fan, my sales manager.
sentences.chinese: 這是方行瀾，我的銷售經理。
